title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status Snapshot

view.title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status
view.subtitle: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

blocks.title: Member Review Bookings completed
blocks.message: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

resultPayload.note: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "First-time setup flow completion time". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Manual Day-and-Hour Pricing Grid. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Holiday and Special-Date Pricing Override. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
